Articles.Content: So I was listing to my music playlist, and while I was listening to it, I brainstormed an idea for a cinematic video to make. Could someone help me with this and tell me the best stuff to use?
This thread has been moved to Gameplay Questions, since it is seeking help rather than offering it.

No idea on what use for  the video capture.

For the "acting" comes to mind:

  • Burn Together
  • Walk About
  • Persistent Trails
  • FMRS
  • HyperEdit
  • Time Control
  •  Every visual mod out there

With some general description of what kind of scene you want to film (no spoils, please) it may be easier to make more specific suggestions
